body.name: Smart Watch(Answer/Make Calls), 1.85"HD Full-Touch screen Bluetooth Watch, Fitness Tracker Watch Compatible with Android&iOS Sleep, Heart Rate Tracker, IP68 Waterproof Sports Watch for Men Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 26 mins
features: On-wrist Bluetooth Calls＆SMS Notifications: Bluetooth watch features on-wrist call and SMS notification capabilities, reducing the need to constantly check the phone and ensuring that you never miss any important communications.

All-Day Health Tracking: Smartwatch for women men can track heart rate, blood oxygen, and blood pressure day and night. Gain insights into your body's state during work, indoor or outdoor activities, and sleep.

8 Sport Modes for Active Lifestyles: Fitness Tracker incorporates 8 sport modes for activities like jump rope, running, sit-ups, table tennis, basketball, badminton, hiking, and more. Sports watch also can track steps, distance, and calories burned during workouts with precision.

1.85” HD Color Display : Enjoy the clarity of the 1.85-inch HD full-screen fitness watch and choose from 100+ watch face styles for personalization, featuring photos of you, family, friends, and pets. Embrace individuality with a waterproof watch face that echoes your unique style.

iOS & Android Compatibility: Smart watch for iOS android compatible Sync seamlessly with devices operating on iOS 9.0+ or Android 5.0+ platforms, making it a versatile choice for a wide range of users. Voice assistant empowers wrist-based phone control – weather updates, remote camera, and music playback.

10 days standby Battery Life & IP68 Waterproof: Activity tracker has a Long-lasting battery that provides up to 10 days of standby, along with an IP68 waterproof feature. Our waterproof watches for women are Perfect for handwashing, rainy days, and swimming confidently.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bluetooth Calls: You can make/get calls, experience crystal-clear calls, and store up to 10 contacts directly on your watch, ensuring distortion-free phone conversations. Message Notifications and Display: Receive SMS text and SNS messages with audible alerts and vibrations, covering platforms like Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, and Messenger when your watch syncs with your smartphone (Note: reply function not available). Stylish Simplicity: 1.85'' HD full touch screen, effortlessly navigate your watch with a responsive touch screen. The screen lights up every time you raise your hand, offering both style and convenience.

INSTANT ACCESS TO YOUR HEALTH DATA ON YOUR SMARTWATCH STAY INFORMED ABOUT YOUR HEALTH AND MAKE INFORMED LIFESTYLE CHOICES 24/7 Heart Rate Monitoring Our advanced HR sensor keeps tabs on your heart rate all day, promoting a healthier lifestyle. SpO2 Oxygen Levels Our smartwatch tracks SpO2 to gauge your body's oxygen absorption. Please ensure your wrist is flat on a surface for accurate results. Note: Data is for reference only, not for medical use.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL SPORTS SMART WATCH 8 Sports Modes & Activity Tracker Our sports watch supports 8 sports modes to meet your various sports styles. (Walking, Running, Cycling, Basketball, Badminton, Pingpong, Jump, limb).Fitness tracker watch accurately records your all-day activities such as steps, workout distance, calories burned, and active minutes.Motivate you to reach your workout goals with real-time stats from your fitness smartwatch. Connect to the GPS in your phone to track all your workout routes and physical conditions during exercise. Sleep Quality Analysis Monitor and assess your sleep easily, recording light sleep, deep sleep, and wakefulness directly on the smartwatch. Practical Features: Enhance your daily routine with useful functions, including a remote camera, music, pedometer, brightness adjustment, phone and watch finder, weather updates, alarm clock, stopwatch, timer, custom dial, health reminder, calculator, etc.

Watch Connection Guide Smart watch with text and call Tip: Please read carefully how to pair two Bluetooth correctly, which is divided into two steps (as shown above). A pop-up window will pop up after logging in to the APP, please allow the APP to get access to the features you need to use.During the connection process of mobile phone Bluetooth, the mobile phone will pop up a Bluetooth pairing request, please select to allow pairing. Kindly Note: The audio cannot be turned on when the watch battery is low. The distance of the Bluetooth connection should not exceed ten meters.If you need to work or study quietly, or do not want to receive any notifications, you can simply use this guide: Open phone's Bluetooth -> Watch 8 -> Share System Notifications -> Turn off.Remind: Make sure that Disturb is turned off, so the watch can receive and display information normally.When the app is connected, the time and weather of the watch will automatically sync with the phone. You can set the time on the phone, but not on the smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and affordable
reviews.reviewText: This works like iwatch most of functionality. Connect efficiently with iOS and android. If you don't want to spend outrageous amount on apple watch this is best alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Worth It
reviews.reviewText: Cons -You have to download an app to make the watch work. The app has lots of Pop Up ads that are difficult to close. Most off the watch faces offered are $1-$3 extra charge. My watch changes to different faces randomly, I keep getting a horse that shows up. The battery only lasts 4-6 hours.Pros - It will shoe you what time it is. My apple 42mm bands fit this watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars NO BATTERY LIFE!
reviews.reviewText: This watch does everything that it says it does, except the fully charged battery doesn't even last a full day... and this is from minimal usage. God forbid you sleep with it on to get your sleep info... you just wasted 80% of the battery. You get what you pay for, so I've learned my lesson and I'll be getting a Galaxy watch instead. It's sad because it really is nice and comfy, but I tried to cut corners and nope. Don't be frustrated with it shutting off constantly, and just get one from a reputable company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my old watch
reviews.reviewText: Bought this watch as a gift for the wife. She didn't have a watch anymore after her fit but died. The amount of feetures and things this can do is amazing. My watch wouldn't even match what it can do and best thing is doesn't even have a requirement for a data plan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Battery does not stay up!
reviews.reviewText: Has to be charges every 8 hours or so!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars App is stuck in test mode, charging is random
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice replica of an Apple Watch 8. After that it’s terrible. App is almost non usable due to it being in test mode which brings a constant string of advertisements which stops the use of the app. The watch buttons and screen do not respond as they should. The watch is slow to respond. At times the notifications work. Battery life is about 8 hours so it does not make it through one day and is dead before your work shift is complete. All around terrible item that isn’t worth the box it’s packaged in. The first watch I received was used which I seem to be receiving a lot of items from Amazon that have been previously used. Amazon needs to be more on top of there game in this area. It’s okay if I know I am purchasing a previously used item for a discounted price but if not noted, I expect a new item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars battery life is short
reviews.reviewText: I like the watch. I wish that the battery would last more that 12 hours. It also disconnects from my phone easily and then I have to reload my image for my background, at other times it will just change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: Poor battery life which made it less than useful.
